summary: Tom's in love with the cute house sitter next door. He's too shy but his older brother visits and helps Tom with the first date. Things don't go as planned.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Teri Polo|Brian McNamara|Fisher Stevens|BD Wong|Tony Rosato|Don S. title: Cita misteriosa
